Welcome to my personal website! I’m **Kunyi Jiang(蒋坤燚)**, a postgraduate student in **Quantitative Economics** at **Xiamen University**’s *Wang Yanan lnstitute for Studies in Economics(WISE)*. My current research interests are in *asset pricing*, *macroeconomics* and *corporate finance*. Feel free to reach me at [wisejky\@stu.xmu.edu.cn](mailto:wisejky@stu.xmu.edu.cn). Check out my <a href="../sources/CV_JKY.pdf" target="_blank">CV</a> for more information about me.
